algorithm_technique: Iterate through the linked list, accumulating sums between zeros and re-linking nodes.
problem_summary_simple: Merge nodes between zeros in a linked list by summing their values.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through a linked list, summing node values between consecutive zeros and modifying next pointers to create a new list without zeros.
key_insights: The problem requires modifying the linked list in-place.
A single pass is sufficient by maintaining a pointer to the last non-zero node that will form the new list.
The initial and final zeros act as sentinels, simplifying boundary conditions.
